column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I came home after work and desperately needed a bath to unwind from the long day .
#id=2
#text=So , I went to the hall closet and I pulled out my towel , various lotions , bath potions and scrubby and took them into the bathroom .
#id=3
#text=I sat my stuff beside the tub and turned on the water to a nice , warm temperature and put in the drain stopper .
#id=4
#text=Since I did n't want to get my hair wet , I brushed it and put it up in a bun .
#id=5
#text=Noticing that the tub was filling nicely , I added in my bath oil and got undressed , folding my clothes and setting them on top of the closed hamper .
#id=6
#text=The tub was full enough , so I turned off the water and slid in .
#id=7
#text=I washed my body with my special soaps and my scrubby .
#id=8
#text=Rubbing down my legs and arms felt pretty good and made the tub smell even nicer .
#id=9
#text=I then sat back and cleared my mind , letting my skin soak in the oils .
#text=After I had relaxed for a bit and the water started to cool , I pulled the drain plug and stood up to grab my towel and started to dry off .
